p: Baricitinib is reported to be effective in the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis in several clinical trials [ 65], with excellent results in terms of clinical response and a good safety profile [ 66]. The literature has reported that the drug blocks the phosphorylation of STATs induced by different cytokines in the blood, and it causes a transient alteration in neutrophil and lymphocyte counts [ 66, 67, 68, 69].
